Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GameModel

Class FaithTrack

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.ReducedModel.RedFaithTrack
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GameModel.FaithTrack
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class FaithTrack
extends RedFaithTrack
FaithTrack Class includes new methods of the Faith Track to be used on the game's Faith Track.
See Also:

    • allAhead

      public void allAhead​(Player player, java.util.ArrayList<Player> players, int steps) throws ModelException
      In this method all the players except for one, go ahead in the Faith Track. This only happens if the player is still connected to the game.
      Throws:
      ModelException
